thread.title: House Democrats Press DOJ To Investigate If Exxon Broke The Law With A Climate Change Cover-up
thread.title_full: House Democrats Press DOJ To Investigate If Exxon Broke The Law With A Climate Change Cover-up - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: House Democrats Press DOJ To Investigate If Exxon Broke The Law With A Climate Change Cover-up
text: WASHINGTON -- Two House Democrats are urging Attorney General Loretta Lynch to launch an investigation into allegations that oil giant ExxonMobil hid research, which verified that fossil fuels play a role in global warming. In a Reps . Ted
